name: Crunchy Shrimp
desc: Convenient snack straight out of water.

name: Tiny Tuna
desc: Convenient snack straight out of water.

name: Rainbow Fish
desc: Convenient snack straight out of water.

name: Rusty Knife
desc:
Still looks sharp a bit.
Could be of service.
message: Took it with themselves just in case.

name: Abandoned Shell
desc: The previous inhabitant had moved away.

name: Engagement Ring
message: Felt a surge in the chest.

name: Drowned Earthworm
desc: Perhaps could still be a viable bait.

name: Wet Bow
desc:
Perhaps needs a bit of drying.
Otherwise looks good to go.
message: Shot an arrow in the knee

name: Silver Key
desc: Blinding glare reflects off the finish.

name: Shiny Trinket
desc:
The surface has a pearlescent finish.
A bit warm on touch.

name: Wet Book
desc:
Radiates with magic energy.
Holds immense power.

name: Unknown Potion
desc:
It is glowing in the dark.
Probably shouldn't risk it.
message: Left a funny taste in the mouth

name: Soul Mirror
desc: Better not look directly into it.

name: Steel Anchor
desc: Traces of blood on the surface.
